Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.states

Class BaseProdOutState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.states.TurnState
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.states.BaseProdOutState
public class BaseProdOutState
extends TurnState
After selecting the resources in input, the player can select the resource wanted in output.

    • selectOutput

      public void selectOutput​(Resource resourceOut)
      Sets the output resource related to a base production
      Overrides:
      selectOutput in class TurnState
      Parameters:
      resourceOut - output resource selected

    • resetState

      private void resetState​(Controller controller, ErrorMessage error)
      This method should be called when an base production fails due to "notEnoughResources" or "productionUsed". If the production is the first one used during the current turn, it will set SELECTION STATE as the next turn, in order to avoid skipping any action. If the selected production is not the first activated in this turn, PRODUCTION STATE will be set.
      Parameters:
      controller - controller of this state
      error - error that caused production failure.

    • completeTurn

      public void completeTurn()
      It adds all the resources produced in this turn to the strongbox and makes the current player's dashboard forget all the productions used in the current turn. Then notify the controller to trigger the next turn.
      Specified by:
      completeTurn in class TurnState
